title: Screen Lag
body: When I initially scroll on my screen it takes a bit before the screen starts to scroll. Once scrolling the speed is normal, but if I stop and start scrolling again there will be a moment of lag time before it starts to scroll again. I haven't been able to find this problem before. It just started happening to me when I got a new computer. Windows 10. I can provide more details if needed.

replies.body:
It's hard to tell the cause based on the info here, it could be a lag spike or even corrupted configuration settings.  What happens if you try using another mouse?  See if resetting your config helps here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
